metadata.title: CVE-2016-1579 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: UDM provides support for running commands after a download is completed,this is currently made use of for click package installation. Thisfunctionality was not restricted to unconfined applications. Before UDMversion 1.2+16.04.20160408-0ubuntu1 any confined application could make useof the UDM C++ API to run arbitrary commands in an unconfined environmentas the phablet user.

criterions.comment: ubuntu-download-manager: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
